Visible glass on the line sig
Capper gas flow in bottle mouth sig
Capper top plate neck guide sig

body.Subject: An error has occurred!
body.ErrorMessage: The ADF pipeline has crashed! Please check the logs.

body.Subject: An error has occurred!
body.ErrorMessage: The ADF pipeline has crashed! Please check the logs.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
        GETDATE() LastCopied,
        cast(bom.Id as nvarchar) [Bom ID], 
        cast(CONVERT(BINARY(16), REVERSE(CONVERT(BINARY(16),concat(cast(bom.Id as char(5)),cast(bwo.Id as char(6)),cast('BOT' as char(3)), 2)))) as uniqueidentifier) as [Bill Of Materials ID],
        bwol.BottlingWorkOrderId as ProductionWorkOrderId, 
        bom.StockCode, 
        bwol.Sequence, 
        bwol.ProductionNotes, 
        book.ProductionLineId, 
        bom.StockCodeDescription, 
        bwol.CasesToProcess / IIF(bom.CartonsPerPallet = 0,1,bom.CartonsPerPallet) Pallets, 
        cast(bom.BottlesPerCarton * bom.CartonsPerPallet as int) BottlesPerPallet, 
        cast(bwol.CasesToProcess * bom.BottlesPerCarton as int) Bottles,
        bwol.CasesToProcess,
        bom.CartonsPerPallet,
        cast(sc.StockCode as nvarchar) [Screwcap Stockcode],
        scpt.Name [Screwcap Printing],
        scc.Name [Screwcap Colour],
        cast(cc.StockCode as nvarchar) [Cork Stockcode],
        ccpt.Name [Cork Printing],
        NUll [Cork Colour], -- Don't think we have this information available. This needs to remain because we cannot remove fields, as it is used in the data factory.
        cz.Name [Cork Length],
        cst.Name [Cork Style],
        cast(co.StockCode as nvarchar) [Cover Stockcode],
        [covcol1].[Name] as [Cover Colour 1],
        [covcol2].[Name] as [Cover Colour 2],
        [covprint].[Name] as [Cover Print Type],
        covt.Name [Cover Type],
        bc.Name [Bottle Colour],
        [c].[BottlingWorkOrderRunAlert] AS [Generic Client Instructions],
        [bwo].[AdditionalInstructions] AS [Work Order Instructions],
        cast([bwol].[AdditionalInstructions] as nvarchar(500)) AS [BOM Instructions For This Run],
        cast([bom].[AdditionalInstructions] AS nvarchar(450)) [Bom Specific Instructions],
        (CASE
                    WHEN bwo.ClientBatchCode IS NULL THEN ''
                    WHEN bwo.ClientBatchCode like '' THEN ''
                    ELSE (bwo.ClientBatchCode + '-')
        END) + book.ProductionRunNumber + c.WWCode + ISNULL(vin.WWCode, '') + ISNULL([var].WWCode, '') AS [BottleLaserCode],
        [botlook].[WWName] AS [Bottle],
        [bot].StockCode [Bottle Stock Code],
        [bot].MouldCode [Bottle Mould Code],
        [bs].[Name] AS [Bottle Size],
        [bt].[WWCode] AS [Bottle Type],
        [bft].[Name] AS [Filtration Type],
        [bwo].[VelcorinTreatment] as [Velcorin Treatment],
        [bwo].[VelcorinRate] as [Velcorin Rate],
        [bookvar].[Name] AS [Booking Variety],
        [bookvin].[Name] AS [Booking Vintage],
        [casevar].[Name] AS [Case Variability],
        null AS [Use All Stock],
        [clo].[WWName] AS [Closure],
        cast([cov].[WWName] as nvarchar(100)) AS [Cover],
        [fla].[WWName] AS [Front Label],
        cast([bom].FrontLabelHeight as nvarchar) [Front Label Height],
        [bla].[WWName] AS [Back Label],
        cast([bom].BackLabelHeight as nvarchar) [Back Label Height],
        cast([ola].[WWName] AS nvarchar(90)) [Other Label],
        CAST([bom].[OtherLabelPlacement] AS NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [Other Label Placement],
        [ola2].[WWName] AS [Other Label2],
        [bom].OtherLabel2Placement [Other Label2 Placement],
        [blaink].[Name] AS [Back Label Inkjet Code],
        [bom].BackLabelAdditionalText [Back Label Additional Text],
        cast([bom].BackLabelInkjetPlacement as nvarchar(100)) [Back Label Inkjet Placement],
        [div].[WWName] AS [Divider],
        CAST([car].[WWName] AS NVARCHAR(100)) AS [Carton],
        [carwinvar].[Name] AS [Carton Variety],
        [cbt].[WWCode] AS [Carton Bottle Type],
        cast([bom].CartonInkjetText as nvarchar(99)) [Carton Inkjet Text],
        [bom].CartonInkjetPlacement [Carton Inkjet Placement],
        [carla].[Name] AS [Carton Label],
        [s].[Description] AS [Carton Supplier],
        [cartoncompany].WWCode AS [Carton Owner],
        [pal].[WWName] AS [Pallet],
        PT.Name as [Pallet Type],
        CASE WHEN [bom].[HardboardTopCover] IS NOT NULL AND [bom].[HardboardTopCover] = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN [bom].[HardboardTopCover] IS NOT NULL AND [bom].[HardboardTopCover] = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '-' END AS [Hardboard Top Cover],
        [sli].[Name] AS [Slipsheet],
        [palstapat].[Name] AS [Pallet Stacking Pattern],
        [extdg1].[WWName] AS [Extra Dry Good1],
        [extdg2].[WWName] AS [Extra Dry Good2],
        cast(case when bom.StatusId = 3 then 0
        else 1
        end as int) [Status],
        bot.QuantityPerPallet [Depal Bottles Per Pallet],
        (SELECT Max(v) FROM (VALUES (bwo.UpdatedOn), (bom.UpdatedOn), (sc.UpdatedOn), (cc.UpdatedOn), (botlook.UpdatedOn), (bot.UpdatedOn),
        (clo.UpdatedOn), (cov.UpdatedOn), (fla.UpdatedOn), (bla.UpdatedOn), (ola.UpdatedOn), (ola2.UpdatedOn), (car.UpdatedOn), (carton.UpdatedOn), (div.UpdatedOn), (pal.UpdatedOn),
        (sli.UpdatedOn), (extdg1.UpdatedOn), (extdg2.UpdatedOn), (Pallet.UpdatedOn)) AS value(v)) at time zone 'New Zealand Standard Time' as [LastUpdatedOn]

    FROM 
    companies.BottlingWorkOrderLine bwol 
    INNER join companies.BillOfMaterial bom on bwol.BillOfMaterialId = bom.Id 
    INNER JOIN [companies].[BottlingWorkOrder] AS [bwo] ON [bwol].[BottlingWorkOrderId] = [bwo].[Id]
    INNER join companies.ProductionBooking book on bwol.BottlingWorkOrderId = book.BottlingWorkOrderId
    INNER JOIN [companies].[Company] AS c ON c.[Id] = bwo.[CompanyId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] sc on sc.Id = bom.ClosureId and  sc.[DryGoodsCategoryId] = 8
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.PrintType scpt on scpt.Id = sc.ScrewcapPrintTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.Colour scc on scc.Id=sc.ScrewcapColour1Id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] cc on cc.Id = bom.ClosureId and  cc.[DryGoodsCategoryId] = 2
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.PrintType ccpt on ccpt.Id = cc.CorkPrintTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.CorkSize cz on cz.Id=cc.CorkSizeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.CorkStyle cst on cst.Id = cc.CorkStyleId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] co on co.Id = bom.CoverId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Colour] covcol1 on covcol1.Id = co.CoverColour1Id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Colour] covcol2 on covcol2.Id = co.CoverColour2Id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[PrintType] covprint on covprint.Id = co.CoverPrintTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.CoverType covt on covt.Id = co.CoverTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [botlook] ON [bom].[BottleId] = [botlook].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] AS [bot] ON [bom].[BottleId] = [bot].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.BottleColour bc on bc.Id=[bot].BottleColourId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[BottleSize] AS [bs] ON [bs].[Id] = [bot].[BottleSizeId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[BottleType] AS [bt] ON [bt].[Id] = [bot].[BottleTypeId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [clo] ON [bom].[ClosureId] = [clo].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [cov] ON [bom].[CoverId] = [cov].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [fla] ON [bom].[FrontLabelId] = [fla].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [bla] ON [bom].[BackLabelId] = [bla].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[InkjetCode] AS [blaink] ON [bom].[BackLabelInkjetCodeId] = [blaink].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [ola] ON [bom].[OtherLabelId] = [ola].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [ola2] ON [bom].[OtherLabel2Id] = [ola2].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [car] ON [bom].[CartonId] = [car].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] AS [carton] ON [bom].[CartonId] = [carton].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[Company] AS [cartoncompany] on [carton].[CompanyId] = [cartoncompany].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[Supplier] AS [s] ON [s].[Id] = [carton].[SupplierId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[CartonLabel] AS [carla] ON [bom].[CartonLabelId] = [carla].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [div] ON [bom].[DividerId] = [div].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [pal] ON [bom].[PalletId] = [pal].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[PalletStackingPattern] AS [palstapat] ON [bom].[PalletStackingPatternId] = [palstapat].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [sli] ON [bom].[SlipsheetId] = [sli].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [extdg1] ON [bom].[ExtraDryGood1Id] = [extdg1].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [extdg2] ON [bom].[ExtraDryGood2Id] = [extdg2].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Variety] AS [carwinvar] ON [carton].[CartonVarietyId] = [carwinvar].[Id]			
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Variety] AS [bookvar] ON [book].[VarietyId] = [bookvar].[Id]		
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Vintage] AS [bookvin] ON [book].[VintageId] = [bookvin].[Id]	
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[CaseVariability] as [casevar] ON [bwol].[CaseVariabilityId] = [casevar].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[BottleType] AS [cbt] ON [cbt].[Id] = [carton].[CartonBottleTypeId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[BottlingFiltrationType] AS [bft] ON [bwo].[BottlingFiltrationTypeId] = [bft].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN companies.DryGood Pallet ON Pallet.Id = bom.PalletId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.PalletType PT ON PT.Id = Pallet.PalletTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Variety] [var] ON bwo.VarietyId = [var].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Vintage] [vin] ON bwo.VintageId = [vin].[Id]
    WHERE cast(book.ExpectedStartDateTime as Date) > getdate() - 30

    Union All

    SELECT 
    GETDATE() LastCopied,
    cast(bom.Id as nvarchar) [Bom ID], 
    cast(CONVERT(BINARY(16), REVERSE(CONVERT(BINARY(16),concat(cast(bom.Id as char(5)),cast(rwo.Id as char(6)),cast('LBL' as char(3)), 2)))) as uniqueidentifier) [Bill Of Materials ID],
    rwo.Id as ProductionWorkOrderId, 
    bom.StockCode, 
    0 as Sequence, 
    rwo.ProductionNotes, 
    book.ProductionLineId, 
    bom.StockCodeDescription, 
    rwo.CasesToCreate / IIF(bom.CartonsPerPallet = 0,1,bom.CartonsPerPallet) Pallets, 
    cast(bom.BottlesPerCarton * bom.CartonsPerPallet as int) BottlesPerPallet, 
    cast(rwo.CasesToCreate * bom.BottlesPerCarton as int) Bottles,
    rwo.CasesToCreate as [CasesToProcess],
    bom.CartonsPerPallet,
    cast(sc.StockCode as nvarchar) [Screwcap Stockcode],
    scpt.Name [Screwcap Printing],
    scc.Name [Screwcap Colour],
    cast(cc.StockCode as nvarchar) [Cork Stockcode],
    ccpt.Name [Cork Printing],
    NUll [Cork Colour], -- Don't think we have this information available. This needs to remain because we cannot remove fields, as it is used in the data factory.
    cz.Name [Cork Length],
    cst.Name [Cork Style],
    cast(co.StockCode as nvarchar) [Cover Stockcode],
    [covcol1].[Name] as [Cover Colour 1],
    [covcol2].[Name] as [Cover Colour 2],
    [covprint].[Name] as [Cover Print Type],
    covt.Name [Cover Type],
    bc.Name [Bottle Colour],
    [c].[BottlingWorkOrderRunAlert] AS [Generic Client Instructions],
    rwo.[AdditionalInstructions] AS [Work Order Instructions],
    'NA' AS [BOM Instructions For This Run],  --Investigate
    cast([bom].[AdditionalInstructions] AS nvarchar(450)) [Bom Specific Instructions],
    '' + book.ProductionRunNumber + c.WWCode + ISNULL(vin.WWCode, '') + ISNULL([var].WWCode, '') 
     AS [BottleLaserCode],
    [botlook].[WWName] AS [Bottle],
    [bot].StockCode [Bottle Stock Code],
    [bot].MouldCode [Bottle Mould Code],
    [bs].[Name] AS [Bottle Size],
    [bt].[WWCode] AS [Bottle Type],
    null AS [Filtration Type],
    null as [Velcorin Treatment],
    null as [Velcorin Rate],
    [bookvar].[Name] AS [Booking Variety],
    [bookvin].[Name] AS [Booking Vintage],
    null AS [Case Variability],
    [rwo].[UseAllStock] AS [Use All Stock],
    [clo].[WWName] AS [Closure],
    cast([cov].[WWName] as nvarchar(100)) AS [Cover],
    [fla].[WWName] AS [Front Label],
    cast([bom].FrontLabelHeight as nvarchar) [Front Label Height],
    [bla].[WWName] AS [Back Label],
    cast([bom].BackLabelHeight as nvarchar) [Back Label Height],
    cast([ola].[WWName] AS nvarchar(90)) [Other Label],
    CAST([bom].[OtherLabelPlacement] AS NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS [Other Label Placement],
    [ola2].[WWName] AS [Other Label2],
    [bom].OtherLabel2Placement [Other Label2 Placement],
    [blaink].[Name] AS [Back Label Inkjet Code],
    [bom].BackLabelAdditionalText [Back Label Additional Text],
    cast([bom].BackLabelInkjetPlacement as nvarchar(100)) [Back Label Inkjet Placement],
    [div].[WWName] AS [Divider],
    [car].[WWName] AS [Carton],
    [carwinvar].[Name] AS [Carton Variety],
    [cbt].[WWCode] AS [Carton Bottle Type],
    cast([bom].CartonInkjetText as nvarchar(99)) [Carton Inkjet Text],
    [bom].CartonInkjetPlacement [Carton Inkjet Placement],
    [carla].[Name] AS [Carton Label],
    [s].[Description] AS  [Carton Supplier],
    [cartoncompany].WWCode AS [Carton Owner],
    [pal].[WWName] AS [Pallet],
    PT.Name as [Pallet Type],
    CASE WHEN [bom].[HardboardTopCover] IS NOT NULL AND [bom].[HardboardTopCover] = 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN [bom].[HardboardTopCover] IS NOT NULL AND [bom].[HardboardTopCover] = 0 THEN 'No' ELSE '-' END AS [Hardboard Top Cover],
    [sli].[Name] AS [Slipsheet],
    [palstapat].[Name] AS [Pallet Stacking Pattern],
    [extdg1].[WWName] AS [Extra Dry Good1],
    [extdg2].[WWName] AS [Extra Dry Good2],
    cast(case when bom.StatusId = 3 then 0
    else 1
    end as int) [Status],
    bot.QuantityPerPallet [Depal Bottles Per Pallet],
    (SELECT Max(v) FROM (VALUES (rwo.UpdatedOn), (bom.UpdatedOn), (sc.UpdatedOn), (cc.UpdatedOn), (botlook.UpdatedOn), (bot.UpdatedOn),
        (clo.UpdatedOn), (cov.UpdatedOn), (fla.UpdatedOn), (bla.UpdatedOn), (ola.UpdatedOn), (ola2.UpdatedOn), (car.UpdatedOn), (carton.UpdatedOn), (div.UpdatedOn), (pal.UpdatedOn),
        (sli.UpdatedOn), (extdg1.UpdatedOn), (extdg2.UpdatedOn), (Pallet.UpdatedOn)) AS value(v)) at time zone 'New Zealand Standard Time' as [LastUpdatedOn]
    FROM 
    companies.LabellingOrReworkOrder rwo 
    INNER JOIN companies.BillOfMaterial bom on rwo.StockToCreateId = bom.Id 
    INNER JOIN companies.ProductionBooking book on rwo.Id = book.LabellingOrReworkOrderId
    INNER JOIN [companies].[Company] AS c ON c.[Id] = rwo.[CompanyId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] sc on sc.Id = bom.ClosureId and  sc.[DryGoodsCategoryId] = 8
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.PrintType scpt on scpt.Id = sc.ScrewcapPrintTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.Colour scc on scc.Id=sc.ScrewcapColour1Id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] cc on cc.Id = bom.ClosureId and  cc.[DryGoodsCategoryId] = 2
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.PrintType ccpt on ccpt.Id = cc.CorkPrintTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.CorkSize cz on cz.Id=cc.CorkSizeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.CorkStyle cst on cst.Id = cc.CorkStyleId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] co on co.Id = bom.CoverId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.CoverType covt on covt.Id = co.CoverTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Colour] covcol1 on covcol1.Id = co.CoverColour1Id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Colour] covcol2 on covcol2.Id = co.CoverColour2Id
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[PrintType] covprint on covprint.Id = co.CoverPrintTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [botlook] ON [bom].[BottleId] = [botlook].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] AS [bot] ON [bom].[BottleId] = [bot].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.BottleColour bc on bc.Id=[bot].BottleColourId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[BottleSize] AS [bs] ON [bs].[Id] = [bot].[BottleSizeId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[BottleType] AS [bt] ON [bt].[Id] = [bot].[BottleTypeId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [clo] ON [bom].[ClosureId] = [clo].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [cov] ON [bom].[CoverId] = [cov].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [fla] ON [bom].[FrontLabelId] = [fla].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [bla] ON [bom].[BackLabelId] = [bla].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[InkjetCode] AS [blaink] ON [bom].[BackLabelInkjetCodeId] = [blaink].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [ola] ON [bom].[OtherLabelId] = [ola].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [ola2] ON [bom].[OtherLabel2Id] = [ola2].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [car] ON [bom].[CartonId] = [car].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[DryGood] AS [carton] ON [bom].[CartonId] = [carton].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[Company] AS [cartoncompany] on [carton].[CompanyId] = [cartoncompany].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[Supplier] AS [s] ON [s].[Id] = [carton].[SupplierId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[CartonLabel] AS [carla] ON [bom].[CartonLabelId] = [carla].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [div] ON [bom].[DividerId] = [div].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [pal] ON [bom].[PalletId] = [pal].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[PalletStackingPattern] AS [palstapat] ON [bom].[PalletStackingPatternId] = [palstapat].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [sli] ON [bom].[SlipsheetId] = [sli].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [extdg1] ON [bom].[ExtraDryGood1Id] = [extdg1].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [companies].[vwDryGoodName] AS [extdg2] ON [bom].[ExtraDryGood2Id] = [extdg2].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Variety] AS [carwinvar] ON [carton].[CartonVarietyId] = [carwinvar].[Id]		
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Variety] AS [bookvar] ON [book].[VarietyId] = [bookvar].[Id]		
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Vintage] AS [bookvin] ON [book].[VintageId] = [bookvin].[Id]	
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[BottleType] AS [cbt] ON [cbt].[Id] = [carton].[CartonBottleTypeId]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN companies.DryGood Pallet ON Pallet.Id = bom.PalletId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN lookups.PalletType PT ON PT.Id=Pallet.PalletTypeId
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Variety] [var] ON book.VarietyId = [var].[Id]
    LEFT OUTER JOIN [lookups].[Vintage] [vin] ON book.VintageId = [vin].[Id]
    WHERE cast(book.ExpectedStartDateTime as Date) > getdate() - 30

body.Subject: An error has occurred!
body.ErrorMessage: The ADF pipeline has crashed! Please check the logs.
